entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
